name: Health
description: National Center for Youth Law works to ensure that all children have equitable access to whole-health care and support that meets their physical, emotional and psycho-social needs. We aim to dismantle the barriers to care that children and youth experience, including involvement in foster care or juvenile justice systems, implicit bias in the health system, and housing or economic instability. Initiatives: - Uphold consent and confidentiality - Empower youth to lead and make decisions about thei
